SEARCH
Package Utils.Events

Class ErrorEvent

java.lang.Object
Utils.Events.ErrorEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Event
public class ErrorEvent extends Object implements Event
Represents an error event within the system. This class encapsulates information about errors that occur, including the error message, type of event, and severity level. Instances of this class are typically created through an EventFactory to ensure consistency and potentially facilitate additional processing or logging mechanisms.

Usage of this class involves specifying the error message, the type of the event (as defined in EventTypes), and the severity level of the error (as defined in SeverityLevels).

This class implements the Event interface, enabling it to be used polymorphically with other event types within the system.
